## Id column creation

If the data_name column is present it is automatically added onto the row_id alongside passed variables in feeder_vars.
For variable sheets that support roles feeder_roles can also be used.
```{r}
library(cchsflow)
library(bllflow)

cchs2001_p <- cchsflow::cchs2001_p
rec_data <-
  rec_with_table(
    cchs2001_p,
    variables = cchsflow::variables,
    variable_details = cchsflow::variable_details,
    attach_data_name = TRUE,
    id_role_name = list(var_name = "ADM_RM0_year", feeder_vars = "ADM_RNO")
  )

rec_data$ADM_RM0_year
```
